title: Brush-Baby WildOnes Kids Electric Rechargeable Toothbrush Koala, 1 Handle, 3 Brush Head, USB Charging Cable, for Ages 0-10 (Koala)
features: DUAL BRUSHING MODE: Our range of kids electric toothbrushes have 2 different power modes which allows for great control and ensures comfort when in use, it is made with hybrid materials, to ensure optimal vibrating speed and enable maximum reach to all teeth.

CUTE KOALA DESIGN: The innovative electric toothbrush for kids has a cute Koala cartoon design makes your children love brushing, you may even find that you will need to tell them to stop brushing their teeth or they won't stop.

EXCELLLENT QUALITY: The waterproof kids electric toothbrushes for 6-12 can work perfectly even during bathing. Equipped with premium motor opertaing in a very quiet manner. It is very convenient to use as it is rechargeable by USB. Long lasting battery lasts a month after four hours of charge (2 min x 2 per day).

RIGHT BRUSHING HABBITS: This kids toothbrush electric are equipped with a 2-minute automatic timer and 30-second reminders that instruct kids to brush the next quadrant of the mouth and help develop dentist-recommended brushing habits.
FLASHING DISCO LIGHT: A built in light makes for fun brushing and it engages the child which will make brushing feel like a breeze. We provide soft bristle brush heads for safe cleaning.
description: Product Description Gentle & Effective Cleaning The age appropriate sonic vibrations and BPA Free DeepClean Flossing bristles, designed for small mouths, clean interdental and gingival regions free of harmful plaque with a 21% increase in reduction over manual brushing. Fun Brushing Experience A new fun brushing experience in animal form for your little ones! Evie here to help your little ones enjoy brushing that little bit more, with her light up top and adorable animal design. Fun Disco Brushing Flashing disco lights turn the fight-to-brush to a want-to-brush as alternating colors light up the brush head to create an entertaining and fun brushing experience. Form Good Habits Award winning design made for small hands, with simple ON/OFF button, make it easy for your little one to brush on their own while the smart 2 min disco light timer with 30 sec quadrant change pulses teaches your child good brushing habits.
